trans-unit.source: Represents the launch information required by a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> that has initiated in response to a peer collaboration invitation.
trans-unit.target: Representa as informações de início de um <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> que foi iniciado em resposta a um convite de colaboração ponto a ponto.

trans-unit.source: An application can inspect the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationLaunchInfo.Data%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationLaunchInfo.Message%2A> properties in this class to get the information specific to the invitation that initiated the application launch.
trans-unit.target: Uma aplicação pode inspecionar as <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationLaunchInfo.Data%2A>e <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationLaunchInfo.Message%2A>Propriedades desta classe para obter as informações específicas para o convite que iniciou a iniciação da aplicação.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationLaunchInfo.Message%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationLaunchInfo.Data%2A>

trans-unit.source: Access to this class requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Acesso a esta classe requer um <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>de <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: This state is created when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer> collaboration session begins.
trans-unit.target: Este estado é criado quando a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>início de sessão de colaboração.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets application-defined binary data associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> invitation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define os dados binários definido pela aplicação associados a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> convite.

trans-unit.source: This data blob is free form and is provided by the caller.
trans-unit.target: O blob de dados é gratuito formulário e é fornecido pelo chamador.

trans-unit.source: The maximum amount of data that can be provided is 4,096 bytes.
trans-unit.target: A quantidade máxima de dados que podem ser fornecidas é 4.096 bytes.

trans-unit.source: The Data cannot be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Os dados não podem ser `null`.

trans-unit.source: An array of bytes that containing the data associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration"></xref> invitation.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de bytes que contém os dados associado a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration"> </xref> convite.

trans-unit.source: Get or set a message associated with the response to the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration"></xref> invitation.
trans-unit.target: Obter ou definir uma mensagem associada com a resposta para o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration"> </xref> convite.

trans-unit.source: The maximum length for the message is 255 Unicode characters.
trans-unit.target: O comprimento máximo para a mensagem é 255 carateres Unicode.

trans-unit.source: Unless explicitly specified, the default value for all properties is `null` for reference types.
trans-unit.target: A menos que especificado explicitamente, é o valor predefinido para todas as propriedades `null` para tipos de referência.

trans-unit.source: A text message associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponse"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration"></xref> invitation.
trans-unit.target: Uma mensagem de texto associado a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponse"> </xref> para o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration"> </xref> convite.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> for which the invitation was sent.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> para o convite foi enviado.

trans-unit.source: Unless explicitly specified, the default value for all properties is `null` for reference types.
trans-unit.target: A menos que especificado explicitamente, é o valor predefinido para todas as propriedades `null` para tipos de referência.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> for which the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration"></xref> invitation was sent.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> para o qual o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration"> </xref> foi enviado um convite.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> that sent the invitation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> que enviou o convite.

trans-unit.source: Unless explicitly specified, the default value for all properties is `null` for reference types.
trans-unit.target: A menos que especificado explicitamente, é o valor predefinido para todas as propriedades `null` para tipos de referência.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> that sent the invitation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> que enviou o convite.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> from which the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> invitation was sent.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> partir do qual o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> foi enviado um convite.

trans-unit.source: Unless explicitly specified, the default value for all properties is `null` for reference types.
trans-unit.target: A menos que especificado explicitamente, é o valor predefinido para todas as propriedades `null` para tipos de referência.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> from which the invitation was sent.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> do que o convite foi enviado.
